moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a small chance of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: To the Top!
moves.effect: Makes move gauges accelerate on the allied field of play. Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.

syncMove.name: Triumphant Hydro Cannon
syncMove.description: Become Mega Blastoise until the end of battle. The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Force Field 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of raising the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: Team Shout 9
passives.description: Raises the Attack or Sp. Atk—or both—of all allied sync pairs when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: Safety Net
passives.description: Makes all allied sync pairs able to endure the next hit they take that would reduce them to 0 HP when a sync move is used for the first time.

grid.bonus: Water Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Water Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
X Defense All:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Hydro Cannon:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Hydro Cannon:Propulsion 2- Has a moderate chance of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful.
To the Top!:Move Gauge Refresh 9- Charges the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
To the Top!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
To the Top!:Pep Rally 1- Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs when a move is successful.
Endurance- If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.
Racing Rain 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.
Raging Rain 3- Powers up moves when the weather is rainy.
Quick Cure- Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user once during battle.
Natural Remedy- Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.
Adrenaline 1- Reduces the sync move countdown by one when a sync move is used for the first time.
Refreshing Rain 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action when the weather is rainy.
Smart Cookie- The more the user’s Sp. Def has been raised, the more it powers up moves.
Wise Entry 2- Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Party Crashers- Ensures the next attack of all allied sync pairs will be a critical hit when the Pokémon enters the battle for the first time.
Team Fist Bump 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring the HP of all allied sync pairs when an attack is successful.
Team Triage Tank 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring the HP of all allied sync pairs when the user is hit by an attack move.
